node.title: The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick - Ways of Hearing
node.description: taking their name from a Peter Handke's novel, adapted into Wim Wenders's first feature, The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick is a new Philadelphia based band. their debut Ways of Hearing reminds of early Bright Eyes records.
node.release: Ways of Hearing was released on Count Your Lucky Stars on October 30, 2020.
